title: SOLD - Severe F/B Miscut T206 Tim Jordan (portrait)
author: JCC

posts.post_title: SOLD - Severe F/B Miscut T206 Tim Jordan (portrait)
posts.post_content:
Payment via ppff.  Offers welcome.


T206 Tim Jordan (portrait) - Piedmont - SOLD
Extremely rare severe front/back miscut.  While the condition is poor, this is one of the most extreme front/back miscuts known to the hobby.  Other better conditioned, but less severe miscuts of this pose have sold for $4000+.  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=586403&d=1693160566[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=589909&d=1695177792[/IMG]
sold two, price cut on the one remaining

[quote name="Brass23" post=2381222]For sale still?[/QUOTE]

Uh, as is stated in the original post, the card has been sold.
